headline: Timberland
text: Timberland is a global leader in the design, engineering and marketing of premium-quality footwear, apparel and accessories for consumers who value the outdoors and their time in it. Timberland products offer quality workmanship and detailing and are built to withstand the elements of nature. Timberland's dedication to making quality products is matched by the company's commitment to "doing well and doing good" - forging powerful partnerships among employees, consumers and service partners to transform the communities in which they live and work. Timberland's ethical Earthkeepers lines instill environmental values into footwear. Since 2007, when the shoes were first crafted, the concept has struck a chord and evolved into a collection of over 100 styles for men, women and children.
